result.name: HipSci imputed whole exome sequencing data for healthy volunteers
result.description: The HipSci project brings together diverse constituents in genomics, proteomics, cell biology and clinical genetics to create a UK national iPS cell resource and use it to carry out cellular genetic studies.  In this sub-study we performed imputed whole exome sequencing using Agilent whole exome pulldown method on iPS cells generated from skin biopsies from healthy volunteers.
